help.name: Name
help.message: Please describe your request in a few sentences

fertigungsauftraege.summary1: In the first step, the total missing quantity of purchased parts is calculated. These must then be split up among the products in which they are used.
fertigungsauftraege.summary2: Example: If K40 is used in P1, P2, P3 and a total of 300 pieces are missing, then 100 pieces may be missing per product.
fertigungsauftraege.summary3: Each product consists of different intermediate products. The intermediate parts use the purchased parts. Taking into account the usage factor from the usage structure of the purchased parts in the products
fertigungsauftraege.summary4: an unproducible quantity for a product. The product with the greatest value for a product 1, 2 or 3 gives the non-producible quantity for the respective product.
fertigungsauftraege.title3text1: All purchased items except 21, 22, 23, 33, 34, 52, 53, 57, 58 are used in all 3 products.
fertigungsauftraege.title3text2: These missing purchased parts are distributed to all 3 products and reduce the value by a factor of 1/3. Example 300 pieces are missing from the purchased item K40, and it is used in P1, P2, P3, then 100 purchased parts are missing per product
fertigungsauftraege.title4: Products that cannot be produced due to the lack of purchased items
fertigungsauftraege.title4text1: If a certain purchased part is missing, then certain products cannot be produced. Products can use a multiple of the products. This is taken from the usage structure. If different purchased parts provide information about a product that a quantity X cannot be produced. The largest number X is used, since this quantity cannot be produced in any case due to this purchased part.
fertigungsauftraege.title4text2: Example: Missing purchase part 20, e.g. 500 pieces, and this purchase part is used 5 times, then 100 pieces cannot be produced from product X that uses K20. If pieces of the purchased part K21 are still missing and this is used 1x for product X, then 1000 pieces of the product cannot be produced.
fertigungsauftraege.title8: Items that cannot be produced due to a lack of manufactured items
fertigungsauftraege.title8text1: All items that structure on other items that cannot be produced, cannot be produced by this number. (Use factor 1: 1 for all items)
fertigungsauftraege.title8text2: Resulting double values for a certain product for a product P1, P2, or P3 then the greatest value for this item is taken within the respective item
fertigungsauftraege.formelerzeugnisse: ( Production orders / purchase part demand per product ) = missing products
fertigungsauftraege.formelgesamt: Missing purchase parts * (purchase parts requirement per product / total purchase parts requirement) = missing purchase items from
